document.full_text: lt. gen. ahmed shuja pasha is the head of the inter-services intelligence directorate, a powerful spy organization with unfettered powers and a general lack of accountability and transparency.
document.title: spy chief's tenure is extended in pakistan
lines_and_colors: lt. gen. ahmed shuja pasha is the head of the inter-services intelligence directorate, a powerful spy organization with unfettered powers and a general lack of accountability and transparency.
